articles.title: Flipkart CEO Kalyan Krishnamurthy buys luxury villa in East Bangalore - Economic Times
articles.description: The villa at Adarsh Palm Retreat in Varthur Hobli has a built-up area of 4,921 square feet and is constructed on a plot measuring 6,918 square feet, according to a document shared by Propstack.
